settings.text: Are you an interior designer, art buyer, gallery or in the trade? Let us inspire your walls & support your next project

custom_css: @media (min-width: 768px) {.image-with-text__items {gap: 1.2vw; background: white; } .image-with-text__image, .image-with-text__content {flex-basis: calc(50% - 0.6vw); background: var(--bg) !important; } .image-with-text__content-items {max-width: 36rem; margin: auto; } .image-with-text__heading {font-size: 2.4rem !important; } .image-with-text__content {padding: 8rem 3rem !important; }}
section_image_with_text_jkbYpP.name: Image with text

settings.title: Let us inspire your walls...
settings.content:
We know how integral artwork can be in a room. And in fact, we know that quite often, some designers like to let the artwork set the mood, tone, & entire vision for the space.

Our WANDER Trade Program was created to connect you to personalized service... and we are here to help. Whether it’s curating a custom collection for you, or simply giving you personalized support for your vision...we have hundreds of WANDERINGS™ FINE ART PHOTOGRAPHY prints to choose from, to elevate your walls.

With a myriad of additional fine art photography/artwork series & collections still not released our website...the WANDER Trade Program was also designed to give you access to this artwork. If you have a color palette or theme in mind, we can work with you to curate a special collection for your space. Want custom sizing & framing? No Problem. And you’ll be the first to hear about Exclusive Limited Edition releases, prior to the general public.

We are passionate about working with other creatives in the field, to help build sophisticated interiors that connect people to nature...and inspire everyone, to WANDER. Our WANDER Trade Program is open to interior designers, contractors, art buyers, galleries, home stagers & other creative professionals in the trade.

Apply TODAY to get started on your journey with us.

settings.title: TRADE DISCOUNTS
settings.text:
Enjoy member-only WANDER
Trade Program pricing & discounts on every purchase. Your benefits increase the more you purchase.

settings.title: EXCLUSIVE ACCESS
settings.text: Get Exclusive Access to hundreds of images not yet sold on our website. Be notified of Signature Series & Limited Edition releases first.

settings.title: CUSTOMIZATION
settings.text: Work with us directly to get additional framing & matting options or other creative solutions for your next interior design project.

settings.title: PERSONALIZED SUPPORT
settings.text: Contact us directly to get one-on-one support or to help curate a special collection for your next project. Let us help inspire your walls.

settings.title: TAX EXEMPTIONS
settings.text:
Provide a resale certificate
for sales tax exemption... saving costs for you & your clients, extending your budget.

custom_css: @media (max-width: 767px) {.section-columns {margin: 1rem 0 !important; background-color: #ececea !important; } .section__heading {font-size: 2rem; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; } .grid--mobile {grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); gap: 44px 18px; justify-items: center; } .grid--mobile > :last-child:nth-child(odd) {grid-column: 1 / -1; justify-self: center; width: 50%; }}

settings.text: Take advantage of TRADE DISCOUNTS, EXCLUSIVE ACCESS, CUSTOMIZATION, PERSONALIZED SERVICE, TAX EXEMPTIONS & MORE by applying for our WANDER TRADE PROGRAM. Get started today on your journey with us.
